name: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games Arcade Edition
overview: Mario and Sonic's coming together for the first time in arcades sees players compete in nine events, including 100m, Hammer Throw and Archery. The game will take you to the Olympic Stadium where you can choose from a legendary cast of characters including Luigi, Knuckles, Peach, and Tails. Help them run, throw and jump their way to victory!
